scripts.compileTypeScript: $(npm bin)/tsc && cd reportUploadTask && npm run compile
scripts.restore: npm ci && cd reportUploadTask && npm run restore
scripts.build: npm run restore && npm run replace && npm run compileTypeScript
scripts.package: npm run build && $(npm bin)/tfx extension create --output-path ./deployment/
scripts.test-publish: npm run build && $(npm bin)/tfx extension publish --share-with cqse --rev-version --output-path deployment --token $(node scripts/cat.js token)
